titleStmt.title: A spittle sermon preach'd in St. Brides Parish-Church, on Wednesday in Easterweek, being the second day of April, 1684 before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor, the Court of Aldermen, and the sheriffs of the now Protestant, and loyal city of London / by Thomas Pittis ...
titleStmt.author: Pittis, Thomas, 1636-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B.W. for Edward Vize ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
